statements: SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'Alice';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donation_id, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE '%John%' AND donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY donation_date ASC, donation_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(donation_amount) AS average_donation FROM donations GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING AVG(donation_amount) > 500;
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donations GROUP BY donor_name HAVING SUM(donation_amount) > 10000;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1
SELECT donation_date, donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donor_phone FROM donors WHERE donor_id > 5
SELECT donor_name, donor_address FROM donors
SELECT donation_id, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donor_phone FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 10
SELECT donation_amount, donor_name, donor_email FROM donations d JOIN donors dt ON d.donor_id = dt.donor_id
SELECT donor_name, donor_address FROM donors WHERE donor_phone LIKE '%123%'
SELECT donation_id, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT donation_id, amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND donation_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT donor_name, email, phone_number FROM donors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT donor_name, email, phone_number FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 'b37a8848-6907-4eda-a4e3-b2c91b8c5f5d';
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT donor_name, donation_date, amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM campaigns JOIN donations ON campaigns.campaign_id = donations.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations LIMIT 5;
SELECT donor_id, donation_date, amount FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, goal_amount FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT donation_id, target_organization, status FROM donation_tracking WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT donor_name, email, phone_number FROM donors WHERE donor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, goal_amount FROM campaigns WHERE goal_amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT donation_id, donor_id, campaign_id, amount FROM donations WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, email, phone_number FROM donors WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY donor_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT donor_name, amount, donation_date FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id;
SELECT campaign_id, goal_amount, reached_amount FROM campaign_goals WHERE goal_amount > reached_amount;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, amount, donation_date FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donor_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT donors.donor_name, campaigns.campaign_name, campaign_goals.goal_amount, campaign_goals.reached_amount FROM donors JOIN campaigns_donors ON donors.donor_id = campaigns_donors.donor_id JOIN campaigns ON campaigns_donors.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id JOIN campaign_goals ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_goals.campaign_id WHERE donors.donor_id = 2;
